kin kunai partima samel nabhaekobhanera sodhnu holarabi sar hajuraharu milera kunai euta parti kholnu hos jun parti janatako hak ra adhikarako lagi hune chhamero prasna hajuraharu duwailai ho

(disha nirdesha) karyakramako kunai eka bhag ma sambadako shilashilamadesh banaunu chha bhanepatrakar bhaera hudainabhanne tarka garda bijay kumar le prasag badalnu bha thiyo eka baristhajimmewar patrakar bhaeko natale pani uhale aaphno thap prasna ya bichar mahami lai bhani din kin aana kani garekosodhi dinu na
desh banaun kebal patrakar bhaera hudainabhanne tarka garne dishanirdesh ka tatkalin pahuna rabindramisra thie
dherai sahityakar alkohalik chhan janataharuma pani yo samasyakai rupama chha

bijayakumar aphai drankar hun
hun hoin thie bhannuparla
purana lekhak ko sindiket kahile sakinchha
mero prasna chha jawaphadehita bihin shasakabaphadarita bihin rastra sewak imandaritabihin pratipaksha khabaradaritahin
janatale ke lokatantra janatako aiswarya ra sarthak banchha patrakarita nepal ko chautho amnga aaphanaima paradarshita aawasyak chha ki chhain
bijay dailai prasna kasari hakahaki kura garna saknu hunchha
yasako lagi karyakram marphat euta apil garna ma anurodh garna chahanchhu yadi yo upayukta hunchha bhane
euta kunai lekhau ani ko harek ma sabai milera garaum ani nepalama aparadh kam garna euta phesabuk aphis kholna dabab mulak sandesh diau

rabisar hajuraka yasta harek kamale ma sadha parsanna matrai hoin bataunai nasakine khusiyalima raMai raheko chhu tar yi ama chhoriko milan bhaeko ra milan garaunama hajurako purna sahayogama mera akhabat ashu bage tapaimko bhabisya sada ujjwal rahos satru sada tadha rahun

jay hos rawi lamichhane timako

naya pustaka sarwadhik prabhawashali sahakarmisamg samwadako awasar mera lagi pani utikai sukhad ho ahile matra hoin barshau aghi prakasit khusi ma pani rabi lamichhane bhaika prati aaphna bhawanaharu pokheko thie

hami am janatakae bahumat tapaikae namama darta gareka chham sar nirdhukka bhaair hidnu parchha sar abakae piyam rabilamachhane sar tapaikae kam karyakae ma sadhai hirday dekhi nai salam jayanepal bhanna chahe sar mis yu tu

ab bikalap khaejane bela bhakae chha janamat rabi sar kae hae bijay sar rajaniti jaejadu haela thaera

ajakal bajarama ekadamai wilasi mahaga sarakari kar tatha 50 si si bhanda mathika sarakari maetarasaikal daaidinchhan sarwajanik sadhanama jhundiera yatra garne hamile tyasta mahaga sadhan sarakaralai kinidin sakdainaai
bhrasta harule janatale Thaha napauda samma bhrastachar garirahane
Thaha paepachhi phirta garchhu bhanera sukh painchha dhanti chhali mudda
antargat ghar bhaera pani gharabhada asulne sabai bhrastaharusai adalatamai mudda dayar garinupardachh
chor le choreko Thaha paepachhi saman phirta garchhu bhanera painchha
srimati ko ghar ma basera hola sriman haru ghar bhada bujheka ani sriman haruko ghar ma basera hola srimati harule bujheka
kathai yesta netapani chhan hai hamro nepalama paisa kasari aaunchh bhanne pani Thahanai chhainare
mero ma aautheyo maile chek nai garin re kati samma laj mardo kura gareko achammaka neta kasalai ke bhanne katai laj pani baki chhar ab kathaihamrodes bhastacharile
uta wikatakae swastha chaaikima sitamael samma chhain yata gharabhada ani ghar marmat bhanera paisha dinerahechh ke yahi ta ganatantra maja
aaj samma hajur ko barema kasaile naram्ro bhaneko suneko chuina sadhai yastai gari nepali ko man ma basnu hola
gharabhada bhanera lageko ta phirta garlan tar ghar marmat bhanera lagine bhadako aadha chahi kyarne hola mahine pichhe ghar marmat chahi ke garna parne raichh

netaharu pani esta payaum ki na tiniharu janata bhanda shikshit chhan na ta yiniharu ma kam garne iksha shakti nai chhan bas chhan ta matra lobhi pan natabad gotabad desh bhakti bhanne ta yiniharu ma Jiri pratishat chha
yi bhrastrachariharulai bhabisyama samsad banna ayogya hune gari barkhasta garinuparchha
jasto bharstrachari karmacharilai garinchha hola yadi yi bharstachari samsadamantriharulai barkhasta garimdain bhane bhrastachar
karmachariharulaipani nagariyos kinaki niyamakanunako najarama sabai barabar
sabaibhanda pahila khojipatrakaritaka madhyamabat bhrastaharulai nanagejhar parne patrakaralai salam

rabi sarako sahas imanadari ra jos le eka din nepal le kolte phernema hami dhukka chhau baru aaphu marinchha tar rabi lai kehi hun dinnau kehi kubichar bhaeka nalaeka haru rabi sar ko khedo khandaichhan tar hami sabai lai niyali raheka ka chhau rabi sar hajur dhukka rahanu hola hajurako lagi hami marna tayar chhau
yo wishayama samwaidhanik padadhikari tatha nyayadhishako pani janchabujh garne ki bhrastacharako anusandhan garne ra phaisala garnako anuhar janatalai dekhaunda sudhar aarambha hunthyo ki
rabi ji chhadidinus gadha haru lai jati dhoe pani gai bandain upiya haru ko jay hos mero desh
yo karyakram rediyo bat pani pratyaksha prasaran hunuparchha
la aajako jasto karyakramama jastai ekabhag chai netaharuko bhandaphor wishesh sai lagyo
sarbahanarako nauma deshako dhukuti rityaun ra garib janatalai karako mar phasayar moj garne
ti papi udus khun chusuwa
hailai sajay kin hudain hijo arulai samanti bhanera kurline udus upiya
aj aphai samanti ka bau banera baseka chhan yastalai karabahi hunaiparchha
lutera haru le luti raheko chha desh lai
lutatantrama na lutera ke gardie hunthyo bhanne lagirachh rabiji

rajadhanima ghar hudahudai gharabhada line adhikams samsadaharule aaphule ghar bhaeko wiwaran bujhaeko ra aaphno namama gharabhada bapatako rakam jamma bhaeko barema midiyama aaepachhi matrai janakari bhaeko bataeka chhan ab pheri samsad sachiwalay padadhikarilai prasna garnus ji ghar bhaeko janakari didadidai kin paisa jammagareko
nepalalai garib banaune yinaharule ghar bhada़ ta khulera bhrastachar garchhan aru kati hasure hola
tapaile uthaunu bhaekae ghar bhadakae kura sarai ram्rae lagyae yasta kura airahaes
ani yasta netaharubat desh bikasako aash rakhne thukka hami nepali
thula thalu gaun ghar tiraka chaera danka haru lutatant
des namakaran garna pae sih darabar pasechhan bichara saejha sajha janatalai pae eain kanun thalathala dakan harulai chain aram kathai nepalakae kanun daibale janun
nepalako rajanitiko kantabijog hamile dieko bhotako satyanas thuikka baiman haru
eknathamadhab jasta dharmadrohi samskariti birodhi lai suraksha hain hanumanadhoka ko euta kotha dinuparchha suraksha hain
byaktigat swartha ko lagi sinai nepal lai khaireharuko gulam banaune khel hudaichh nepal lai isaikaran banaera samayamaijagauhami
suninchha yo samstha kamyunista birodhi re
tar hamra kamyunista netadayaharu nai lam lagera tamajhamaka sath parameswar ki chhoriko aashirwad grahan garna gae dalarale pani kamal nai garyo
gathedharmalai aphim manneharu aaphai waibal samai parameswarako stuti gauchhna bhane yiniharu kamyunista bhae ki kamaunista hajur

rabi sar tapaimle janata ko jijnasa lai ekanath dhakal samaksya prasna rakhirahada uhan ko prati uttar nai chittabujhdo aae jasto mahasus bhaena tar pani jehos aaphno saskar ma rajya prati thorai nai bhae pani hilo dalne kam bauddhik jamat bat nai bhaekoma uhan jasto manya lai buddhi ko saderi naparosajay hos
hindu rasta lai dharma nirpachhya kae namama bidesi haru bat dalar khaair kasaikae biraedh chhain bhannu sur्chha kae madh garnu bhanda thulae aparadh behi hain
sarakari uchcha aehadaka saeshak dalal harukae karan nepali janatale kahile santi ra bikas kae mahasus garnu
lai kunama lyaera studiyoko ram्ro sang prasna sodhnu ta rawiji laj lagchha sochda yasta manchhele pradhanamantri pad dharan gare yo deshama pawar ma hunda ke ke widhwums machchaeko holan inile
abako misan bhaneko nai yasta bhastcharilai nanggaudai januparchha rabi sarajanata sathama chham

dhanna rawi dai hunuhunchhar nepali garib sidhasadha janatako manama aasa bharosha chhaeuta sram karyalay sudharna nasakne gokarnaele gaph ta aakasaka tara jharne gardai thiyo tasidhai gokarna wista sang phlo ap garnun rawi daju sram karyalayako sthiti ko barema
yi thulthula rajaniti kura hamilai nasunaunu baru asti sudharagarihama simgham param chhapa marera
reskyu gareka tyape jadyaha ganjadi dragisalai ke garnubho tineruko awastha kariyakalap ke chha riportin garnu paro janata janna chahanchhan
yi sabai dharmadrohi ra desh drohi hun ekanath pani makune pani bhikhamumga haru hun kataura liyera dalar magdai chhan
rabi sar hajur lai dhamki dineko ke bhayo
kura gari ke sadhya ra rabi ji
lajja sharanam nepal ka haru
bhani sakyachhan aarop sidda bhay tudhikhelama lagera jhundaunu ho yadi aarop sidda hunchha bhane dhilanagari inlai jhundaun parcha
mukunde bhanda nalayak wyaktiharuko hatama desh
paisa bhayechhi kehi chaiden bhanne sochale aaj byakti hudai rastra samma dubna lagyo
snehi kakh lai lakhau salam
aj duniyan paisako pachhi hod baji chaleko chha
kasle kasalai jitne tar samajama yasta udaran pani chhan jo apanu pet katera dosrako pet agaeka chhan Sabailai dhanyawad
salam chha rawi sar hajur lagi
yaॉha jodanu parnet patitat patitanai bhae simgo samnsaralai rajyagarne prabhubhaktaharu yasta hosaharaeka sametako dharmantaranama lagnu thulo beijat hainar
sarai ram्ro kam didi lagaeta uhako tim sampurna lai dherai dherai subhakamna yasta kam haru ko dherai jaruri chha salam chha
midiyale aphno jyanako baji lagaera bhandaphor garchha kehi kalakote bardidhariharule kamajor banai muddha pes garchhan
ani sadharan tarekhama kukhyat aparadhiharu chhutchhan loain yo deshako kalakoteharuko wuddhima birko ughriyos
rabi sar ab ta ati bho deshama kehi garnu hosya ta kunai partima samel hunu hos hoin bhane aaphai parti kholnu hos
karodabhanda karod janatako sath huda pani kin chup lagera basnu bhaekohajuraka kamaharu lai salam garchhurab
i sar ab parti kholnu hos hami sadhai hajurako sath ma chhau
durbesnima lagnu pani thik hoin sar yasto dikka banauchhan iniharule ki bhognelai nai Thaha hunchha ram्ro aacharan bhidekhi rakhnu nai pardain
thiyo iniharu na aaphu ram्rosang bachchhan nat arulai santile bachna dinchhanayadyapi amanawiy karya garnu galat ho
thula kura garne asal kam ko sinko nabhachne bandar prabritika prabhubadi netalai rakhna uttam sthan rahechh
salam rabi sar
aaphnai daju bhai chhori cheli mathi ko yasto dur byabahar
kasam man ruera aauchh
nepalama aru rabi 24 jana janminu parchha rabi lai salam chha
ati bho ni yo ta paisa pani tirnu ani pisab pani yasko sajay kada hunu parchha
merae tarphabat salam rahirahaes harek pal palama rawi sar hajurakae kathaera bacha laksya sada sada yastai rahirahaes jay haes
garjenale pani sisitibhi kae bharama herera ghar najanu parne thyae rawi sar eka patak merae chhaerasang baelera janchhu bhannu parne
dardanak
rajadhanima sarakar dekhi sadak samma ka sabai dhanda ra kamakaj haru krur ra amanabiy tabarale nai chaliraheka chhan
paisaka lagi katisamma krur ra amanawiy hun sakda rahechhan hai yi danawaharu
tehra basna paisa tirnu parne raichh bharkhar eka janale hajar jati tirera rakhnu bhayako chha kesh Jhapako ho tirna parne ra naparne bare pani prasta bujhai dinu hola
yi krur rakshasi prawaritika danawaharulai shir chhedan gare pani kam sajay hunchha manawata mareka manawaharu pap karayo juni bhar jelama sadaunu parchha
waru jelama pani tyasto gharinait yatana hudain hola nar pichasaharu
salam sar eka sachcha nepal aama ko saput hajurako pratyek karya prati Gaurbhale praphullit chhau
je hos sidha kura janata sanga eka yasto karyakram ho jaslai dil dekhi nai salam garna man lagchha ra garchhu pani
ahile jaslai samasya parchha pulish ko ma hoin yani rabi sarako tim lai samjhine garchha yo biswash ho prati jay hos rabi sar

bhrastacharile ghus magnu ra balatkarile balatkar garne prayas garnu ekai ho jasale tapaiko ijjat lilam hunchha eka sachet nagarikako haisiyatale ghus khuwaun banda garau ra kasaile ghus magchha bhane khabaradari garau
bhrastachariharuko ajhau bhandaphor gardai janus shubhakamana rabi sar
hajur patrakarita jastai hajur jastai aru jana niklie desh le rahat paune thiyo salam rabi sar
pad ko bhar ma manab bech bikhan garne nepali rajadut lakki serpa lai sidai jamin muni chhiraunu parchha ta ki aaune rajadut tatha bhako rajadut lai chetana hos

rajadut le nai yasto garne bhayapachhi arule ke baka़i rakhlan ra arkom kura janna man bhayako yadi rajadutawas bat kunai nikayama karbahiko lagi patrachar bhayako khumdama sambumdhit nikayale karbahi garchha ki gardain
bhrastachariko 13dine pustanai kiraparera narkama janu paros bhanda hunchha ki rabi dai
sano sachchai kanres prawakta wiswa prakash sharma
rajadut doshi sabit bhae ke sajay hunchha holajijnasapawar ra paisama bikne hamro deshako kanun ti kanunaka theli padhnele nai janun
dherai ram्ro kamako suruwat
Saptari basi eka utpidit samudayaka lagi yahanle puryaunu bhaeko yogadan prabhuko khatama hajur nimti satkarya bhani lekhine chha asamkhya dhanyawad

musahar basti hastantaran samgai sidhakura karyakramako 300 aum bhagama aaera janaanjanama bhaeka galtiharu swikar garda dherai khusi ani yas karyakram prati jhan badhi biswas bhayo lakhaum karodaum episaed haru dekhna paiyos shubhakamana
wahabadhai ho yastai khushika kha़baraharu sadhai sunna pai rahun hajur yugayug samma rahanu hajurako jay hos
ke bhannu ra rabi dai bolnelekhne sabda nai chhainatadai bat bhaepani tanakka tankera salyut bajareko chhu suikaridinu hola
badhai chha dai ab karnali ko haspitalale pani muhurta rup liyi chhitobhanda tyahaka janatale aaphno swastha sewa prapta garne chhan dhanyawad ko patra hunuhunchha daju
rawi lamichhane bideshi nagarik ho bhanera bitanda jhikne le pani yo srinkhala hernu bhayo hola wahan lai pani shubhakamana
badhai
musahar wasti
hardik badhai tatha subhakamana

badhai tatha shubhakamana rabi dai karib 3 karod janaman bokeko yati baliyo karyakramale 300 sharinkhala pura gareko yo ghadima tapain ra tapainko timako sammanama kharcha garne kunai baliyo shabdaharu nahunda nahundai pani hariddhayako antim bindudekhinai sammanit badhai tatha shubhakamana ochchhyaena dai

dherai ram्ro kam
yo kam udaharanako eka khamba bhaeko chha jasale garda hamilai ni kam garne urja mileko chha samman ko artha tapailai herda pugda rabi da
